author: Staff Reporter
text:
Thoothukudi Fast Track Mahila Court Judge J. Flora on Wednesday issued witness warrant to Cuddalore Deputy Superintendent of Police N. Mani, who formerly worked in Srivaikuntam, in a case pertaining to dowry harassment and abetment of suicide.

Despite having issued summons, the investigating officer as witness in the case mentioned above did not turn up. Hence, the Judge directed him to appear before the court on February 26.

In yet another case concerning Section 4 of POCSO Act, a witness warrant was issued to the then Inspector of Police, Nazareth, Nagarajan, who is currently stationed in Tirupparankundram in Madurai. He was directed to appear before the court here on February 18.
title: Witness warrants issued
